description: A React component implementing a sidebar UI for a dashboard, allowing users to select connectors (Jira and Confluence). Includes icon components, event dispatching, and responsive behavior.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: Main React functional component for the sidebar, managing connector selection and responsive UI behavior.

methods.name: JiraIcon
methods.description: A React component rendering the Jira icon SVG.

methods.name: ConfluenceIcon
methods.description: A React component rendering the Confluence icon SVG.
